title: Unmei no Hito ni Deau Hanashi
sinopse:
Yuki Honda came to Tokyo for college two years ago without making much of a social life in that time. Hoping to meet someone new, she goes to a club for the first time with her college friend Sanae. There she meets Iori, a boy who made a lousy first impression on her.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
